website_summaries.verdict: A classic wrist blood pressure monitor.
cons: Tends to display readings a bit high
Bluetooth may not work with newer mobile devices

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. Im a Nurse looking for a good wrist BP cuff for patients I see on a regular basis. I got this machine yesterday. I took my blood pressure three times and the batteries died within an hour. I tried to replace batteries with brand new Duracell batts and it still said batteries were low. Don’t purchase this item!
customer_reviews.author: ChristIe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this blood pressure monitor is smaller than the traditional upper arm cuffs. It makes it a lot easier to maneuver and put on. I will say that the first time I used it I got a really strange reading and I knew it wasn’t right. I adjusted the band and re-took my blood pressure and it seemed right then. So I do think that this has to be in the exact right place in order to get the right reading. For me that’s fine because I take mine often but if you’re somebody that doesn’t you may not realize that.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Peaks

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate readings
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is very inaccurate. In addition, I ordered a blood pressure cuff. Took both to my doctor’s office to compare with their equipment and this monitor was way off ! Be certain to take this monitor to the doctor’s office and you’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Selective Lady

customer_reviews.title: Guessing is more accurate
customer_reviews.text: The device is incredibly inaccurate. My wife and I both took our blood pressure several times and got very different results every time. The monitor was used exactly according to the directions. We even compared the monitor’s pulse reading to manually taking it, and it was off. I have no idea how this blood pressure monitor got such high ratings on here. I’m hoping we just got a defective unit for the sake of others who have purchased this. Medical devices and inaccuracy are a dangerous combination!
customer_reviews.author: otherelbow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I found this BP monitor to be reasonably priced, easy to use and accurate compared to measurements I usually get at the doctor office. I like the fact it has picture instructions directly on the cuff itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Do  not buy
customer_reviews.text: pure junk normally iam at 130/90 this one read 80/60
customer_reviews.author: Gilleydog

customer_reviews.title: Small and Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This small, compact product does a tremendous job in a big way. The product is incredibly easy to use. Instructions accompany the product but honestly are not necessary. The instructions for me seem to be more valuable when attempting to figure out any error code that may pop up. It explains the code quickly and recommends what you need to do to receive a correct reading. I have been extremely impressed with the product and look forward to continuing to use it over the years as a helpful tool to assist in my health.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Blood Pressure Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This blood pressure monitor is quite easy to use. And the fact that you position it on your wrist makes it all the more attractive. The display is large and easy to read. It delivers its results with speed and accuracy. I just wish the cuff were a bit bigger. The quality is ok. I think it will last a while. I recommend this blood pressure monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Welch

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband to monitor his blood pressure when I am not home. We tried it the day it was delivered and his pressure varied from 90/50 to 140/90 in the same arm within 30 minutes. I checked with my manual cuff and got 130/85. I replaced the “no-name” brand batteries it comes with and got the same range if results. He was sitting at a table so his wrist was at the proper level, just as stated in the directions. This is going back. I probably won’t order another wrist model.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Easy, accurate, and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact this blood pressure monitor is. It's very simple to use and seems accurate. The instructions were precise and easy to follow. I love the memory feature as well because it makes tracking your numbers throughout the day easier.
customer_reviews.author: Desire'

customer_reviews.title: Runs down Batteries overnight
customer_reviews.text: This item seems to work OK, but even when turned off, it depletes the strongest batteries OVERNIGHT. Wate of money and time. Do not recommend this item for anyone that is serious about quality.
customer_reviews.author: daveo91

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This does not give a true reading. I bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Faize

customer_reviews.title: Compact and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is small and convenient. You do have to hold your wrist in a specific position to get an accurate reading. I got an error message 3 out of the first 4 times I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Not for
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product ever. There is no in off button. You start it by pressing start. I’m a nurse and keep it in my bag. Every time I move the start Button gets pressed and it goes off constantly. Now the battery is always dead and my patients and always asking me”what’s that noise”
customer_reviews.author: sydney

customer_reviews.title: Returned. Not able to get it to work.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this might be the answer after my arm cuff BP monitor pooped out. It wasn't. I tried numerous times and in many different positions on my wrists, but the readings were either way off or very inconsistent. I took it to my doctor, who compared it to their readings. No comparison. They tried to set it up also, but still not right. Maybe I just got a bad unit, but I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Results
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this gave very inaccurate readings. I do have high blood pressure, which is why I purchased this to monitor it. But based on the numbers I’ve been getting from this cuff, I should be in the hospital. I got only one reading that was in line with the automatic cuff in the gym. Even gave my mom a reading of 198/110 and she doesn’t have elevated blood pressure. I’m pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: So compact and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I've been having some issues with my blood pressure. This device makes it super easy to check my BP anytime, anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: victoria dee campos

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously Innacurate
customer_reviews.text: I had my concerns over whether or not this cuff would work properly and I got my answer. This cuff is dangerously inaccurate. I brought it to my doctor’s visit and my BP via manual cuff was 114/65 while this cuff gave a reading of 165/95. I am an RN and to me it is scary that people may be using this to determine if they should take or hold their medication. It’s going back. If I purchase another cuff it will be from a medical supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Sort of excellent
customer_reviews.text: My only 2 complaints are that you have to be careful in storing it because any slight touch on the face of the monitor will start it up. I found putting it back in the box face up is the best but don't put anything on top of it. and the instructions are printed so small it is hard to read. I bought this mainly to take to work because my BP fluctuates so often. It is accurate and keeps good records so I can report to my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Czochara

customer_reviews.title: Painless, Portable, Compact and Convenient...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this to track my blood pressure and the readings have been pretty consistent. I like that it saves your readings so you can compare the results and establish a trend. It certainly beats having to write it down and keep up with the paper. The unit is small and very portable. It is easy to pack and doesn't take up much space. Getting a B/P is not painful at all compared to having it taken in your arm. It is also much quicker than a traditional B/P machine. I have been very pleased with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Oh, How I Wanted This to Be As Accurate As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact, super easy to use. The issue: wildly inaccurate, at least in my case. I am a challenging hypertensive, with unmedicated reads as high as 202/160 (hello, stroke). But this wonderfully designed little device was simply maddening! Within a half hour (5 minutes between reads and alternating wrists left/right), I got an "ERR04," "ERR04," "111/79," "OUT," "ERR04," "149/95," and "OUT". WHAT?! So as much as I LOVE this little unit for its design, it's being returned. I am SO disappointed! It's back to the upper arm cuff version that I despise :(
customer_reviews.author: A Lover of Words and Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Removing batteries erases all records
customer_reviews.text: Device was easy to use. The design is rather dated, but it works. The instructions are very clear. Easy to set up. Two issues I had: 1. Setting the date and time only allowed you to increase numbers. If you mess up, you have to remove the batteries to reset the values and redo the setting. 2. Since taking out the batteries resets the device, if your device runs out of battery, you'll lose the record of blood pressure values in the device. Considering this is something that might not be used on a consistent basis, it's a drawback. You'll have to keep a record of your blood pressure elsewhere just in case.
customer_reviews.author: BTSMerchUpdates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact blood pressure monitor
customer_reviews.text: I recently learned that heart disease/high blood pressure is pretty prevalent on both sides of my family, so I wanted an at home blood pressure monitor to keep tabs on my own. The Proven blood pressure monitor is exactly what I've been looking for. It is compact and has an easy to use cuff, that reads on the wrist. It makes the struggle to position a full cuff on the upper arm a thing of the past. With a one touch start and easy to follow instructions, I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking to monitor their blood pressure at home.
customer_reviews.author: Prime shopper

customer_reviews.title: Buy a product that can save your life.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchase this product. My blood pressure has been so high lately, so I needed something to monitor it. My doctor has advised me to get one of these, so I'm glad I finally did. This thing is so suitable for people who are not in the medical field, but yet it is clinically accurate. It's very easy to use, and definitely a total life saver. The large screen display, large font, HD readings are very convenient for anyone especially the elderly. Makes a great gift for parents too! Very portable and handy, and it's going to save my life!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Travels

customer_reviews.title: Portable enough to take anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Small and portable, this device is super easy to use with readings available in seconds. You can definitely feel the pressure while in use, but it’s not so tight that it’s uncomfortable. The clinic does it so tight it’s literally painful. It should easily fit multiple sizes of wrists. Read the instructions. You need to be positioned correctly for a more accurate reading. It suggests not to use it right after eating. It should be at heart level. Don’t cross your legs. It does have a simple color guide along the side to show the category your numbers fall into.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced blood pressure cuf
customer_reviews.text: I have had the cuff for a couple of weeks now, and there is a learning curve involved. It seems to work most accurately on my left arm, has to be fairly tight, and the monitor has to be at your heart level with your elbow resting on a table or chair arm. It is easy to read and operate and the cuff fits larger wrists than many other makes (my daughter has an Omron that isn't close to big enough for my wrist). My wrist is 10" and the strap has another inch or so left. It seems to be within a few points of an upper arm cuff consistently, so decently accurate. I'm pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Moegenburg

customer_reviews.title: Seems good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use. It comes in compact cardboard packaging, which I appreciate greatly. It's not loud at all, especially when compared to the ones at the doctor's office. I can't tell if it gives accurate readings, my blood pressure is usually moderate and it says it was low-to-regular. The family members that tried it were getting normal readings. I have not had a chance to compare it to another machine yet. You have to hold your arm at a certain angle on a table, it says this in the instructions and on the band itself. It's similar to how you have to hold your arm in the electronic ones at the pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Compact and so simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is great! I absolutely recommend it if you’re looking for a portable machine for testing blood pressure. The functions are very easy to navigate and the instructions are fairly easy to follow. I had some readings that were very different every use but keep that in mind.. Once I followed the instructions closer, they were more even and I was able to get a good average set of numbers. The best part is that there are 60 slots to store past readings! For someone who needs to test DAILY, this feature is so handy! Overall, it’s not what I would say hospital accurate but it greatly compares to any other cuff measuring systems on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this monitor. The instructions were very clear, and the monitor itself is very accurate. I'm an RN, so I have a high standard for home medical devices, and this definitely passes muster with me. There are batteries included in the box, which is great! The instructions are very clear about how to get an accurate reading - the steps are 100% medically correct. I tested this on myself and on my husband several times, and when I took my husband's blood pressure manually with a sphygmomanometer, the readings from the monitor were very consistent. I feel like this monitor is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Small, easy to use, accurate
customer_reviews.text: The product was everything I wanted in a blood pressure monitor. Small, easy to use and accurate. I've done multiple checks using this monitor and immediately using a cuffed monitor to get a comparison in reading, and both are same, so I know this monitor is accurate. It's easy to store this in the medicine cabinet, and take it with you when you travel. Much easier to use than a cuffed monitor where you might need another person to help you slip it on. This monitor can be used by the elderly with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Mitesh P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the other reviews regarding battery issues...mine does flash as if it has low battery, but it still keeps on working and I have not had to replace the batteries yet despite using it over twenty times. I am happy with the ease of use and the accuracy. I am currently on chemo and get my bp done at the hospital several times a week. The readings I get there are in line with those I get on this. I bought it because I have been having problems with low bp and need to keep a close eye on it. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Quick results, little pressure!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, it does the test really quickly with little pressure. I like how it saves the results with the time and date so you can review your progress. Another big plus is how small and compact it is, very easy to store. My biggest plus was it only applying little pressure and getting results in less than like 5 seconds usually the arm ones apply a lot of pressure and take like 30 seconds and I don't like really anything medical because of my anxiety so I try to find ways to stay healthy without freaking out. Lol Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are included! Device is easy to use and easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: This is a much more portable wrist blood pressure device than I had anticipated. This blood pressure cuff is supposed easy to use and easy to store! The package came with the AAA batteries for the device and the LCD screen is large and easy to read. When using this device make sure that your hand is placed on your chest while taking a reading. If you leave your hand by your side, you'll get an abnormally large reading. But besides that this is a very accurate blood pressure monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Could save you time, money, or even your life.
customer_reviews.text: After months of headaches and dizziness, blurred vision, and chest pain. Despite the ER visits and doctors visits. It’s was taking blood pressures and pulse at home when the symptoms were happening and reporting them to the doctor that finally identified the cause. This BP monitors is easy to use is consistent with the other monitor we have and the squeeze is much more gentle. So this one would be good for those with sensory issues (we have this), sensitive skin, or who bruise easy. Defiantly worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Vaeth

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: It is very inaccurate. You will not get a reading that will help you to properly manage your blood pressure. Too bad, I had high hopes as it is light weight and easy to use as long as you followed the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: A. Manzi

customer_reviews.title: Good little machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little machine that has been designed to make taking a blood pressure reading easy. Wrist monitors aren’t supposed to be as accurate as cuffs but this one seems just fine and so much easier to use than the cuff. It’s a quick reading. It’s compact and not super noticeable so you can leave it on your desk or carry it around without taking up space or drawing attention to itself. The only drawback compared to similar machines is that the display is a bit dim and small for me but it does save the readings so it’s a minimal problem.
customer_reviews.author: TorchLit

customer_reviews.title: Very hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone that truly needs to know. Maybe just to have around if you’re wondering because it’s very hit and miss on the readings. It startled me at first because it said mine was 195/101 haha and mine is usually average (110-120 over 70-80) a few more readings and it gave a more accurate reading. Then bounced all around again. It is very easy to use, easy to read and handy. It can also a lot of unnecessary stress haha
customer_reviews.author: Momto4

customer_reviews.title: Accurate once you figure out how to position it on your wrist
customer_reviews.text: I like the monitor and it works very well. The instructions are poor, however. It was not clear to me that the monitor needed to be positioned to the inside of the wrist to work properly. If you do that, you'll probably love the convenience of a wrist pressure monitor. If you get readings that seem very far off where you think they should be -- like I did -- experiment some and you might figure it out. I'm happy with it now that I have!.
customer_reviews.author: Bartilda

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I would absolutely reccomend this product! Upon receiving, everything was well packaged and intact. The product itself has a wonderful interface which is large, clear, and easy to read. Everything looks very well made, and will likely last for years to come. Utilization is simple, with a press of a button! The directions are super clear, and I think it is wonderful that it stores records so that you can see trends! My BP is typically the same, regardless.. but to ensure this products accuracy I used it immediately after my BP was taken at the doctors. Guess what? Exactly the same! Again, highly reccomend this product for anyone who is interested in or needs to monitor their BP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must read directions, but pretty easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I like this blood pressure monitor. If you aren't wearing it right, you're likely to get an error message (mine was E04) instead of a reading. I appreciated that because it made me trust the readings that were reported. This monitor is more compact than those I've seen in other homes, and it reads from your wrist so you can wear a long sleeved shirt as long as it isn't too tight on your arms. I would recommend this to someone who wants to closely monitor their blood pressure
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Readings are all over the place....
customer_reviews.text: The monitor gives drastically different readings in the same sitting when tested back to back with no change in condition. One test reading showed hypertension the next test shows normal the results are all over the place. I'm returning mine due to the inaccuracy of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great at home tool to keep track of your blood pressure and heart rate.
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of the cuff. I like that I dont have to go to the doctor to know what my blood pressure is. I have high blood pressure already so I like to keep track of it. I especially like that it has a memory so I can see what it was yesterday or last week. I am not so sure about the accuracy because it doesnt seem to match what my blood pressure normally runs when I go to the doctor. I am at the doctors almost every month for other issues and it seems with this product my blood pressure runs higher than what it does at the doctor
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: It's accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was told by a pharmacist that wrist BP devices are not as accurate as arm ones. But, I was having trouble managing the use of an arm BP monitor on my own. I asked a nurse about her experiences with BP devices. She said as long as you buy a decent (not the cheapest) wrist device and follow directions, it should be as accurate as the arm ones. I did my own test: used both for several days, 15 minutes apart. They were very, very close. The wrist one is SOOOOO easy to use so I end up monitoring more often.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ann Raulerson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for home blood pressure monitoring!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for monitoring your blood pressure at home. The item came well packaged with detailed instructions as well as batteries. Setup was quick and easy. The wrist cuff is comfortable and sized to fit a large range of wrist diameters due to its easily adjustable Velcro closure. Using the item is easy and pain free and a blood pressure reading takes seconds to complete. The lcd screen lacks a backlight so it would not really be suitable for use in a dark room, but other than that, this is a great item!
customer_reviews.author: jgreen

customer_reviews.title: Easy portable BP monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a highly portable blood pressure reader. I like this because it is easy to use and I can easily take it with me. I haven’t gotten it checked by my Dr office yet for accuracy but it has been pretty close to my “normal” range. It is fairly easy to accidentally bump the button to turn it on so I keep it in the box it came in. Super easy to use. Although it does recommend sitting for a few minutes and keeping your arm at heart level and being in a silent room. This is something that limits its versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hill

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: This blood pressure monitor works perfectly. I love it. It is fast and extremely easy to use. I have used other monitors that take a long time to give a reading but this one is very fast. It is accurate and easy to read. I love having the indicator on the left that gives you an idea of how your blood pressure should be. The band fits prefect around all wrists I've tried it on including children. I love this product. Highly recommend to keep in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Good for wrist cuff monitor
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s a good and easy to use wrist cuff monitor. However, My experience after having used the monitors that have cuffs for you upper arms, is that those are consistently more accurate. The big advantage of the wrist cuff monitor is size and easy to bring for travel. If you are ok with plus or minus 5-10 points on your readings, this is as good a wrist cuff monitor you are likely to find. For me, I just wanted something easier to carry for long trips and an approximate reading is good enough for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy
customer_reviews.text: This is very similar to the one my physician uses. Both my husband and I need to keep a watch on our blood pressure. I have used the standard cuff for years and I will admit it was a bit of a pain. It was a bit cumbersome so it was easy to put it off. This wrist monitor is quick and so easy to use. I compared the reading it gave to my standard cuff and each time they were within a few mmHg of each other. If you need to monitor your blood pressure this is an easy way to do it. An added feature is that it will pick up an irregular heartbeat according to the information.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Bad Read
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about receiving this blood pressure cuff considering the reviews. The cuff did not work. I consistently received an error code -- which meant either the cuff was too loose or too tight and would not provide a reading. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: This was a first time purchase of an electronic BP device for my wife and I. I bought it for her actually, as she it taking BP meds. Measured at the wrist is so easy. We keep it in the kitchen because she is there most of the time with her catering hobby. Just slip it on, secure the velcro wrap, and push the button and watch it work. Its time to process is very quick. The digital read out is large and easy to read. Truly a 21st Century device. We both use it. We both recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonapart

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: So, since not all health things (such as my Fitbit) syncs to iHealth, I did a FAQ search for the term 'iHealth' and saw that someone asked if it syncs to iHealth, to which they were told yes, it does. Well, let me tell you, IT DOES NOT. This is not Bluetooth compatible, and I kind of got scolded by the Amazon rep when I said searched for 'iHealth' and was basically told I should have searched "Bluetooth". Really???
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Felton

customer_reviews.title: It works very good and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife gets pain when she uses the arm monitor so I bought this one to see if it worked any better than the arm one. The arm one was checked by a doctor and verified that it was very good to use at home. I took a blood pressure test with the arm band one and then took a test with the cuff one, they were almost identical readouts! This is a good machine and very handy to take with you when you travel. I will know more about this cuff machine later but the last 4 readings have been good. I would recommend this to anyone that needs to monitor there blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Wrist Blood Pressure watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a few days now. Overall, once set up with date, it's easy to use. A disappointment that I've noticed is that occasionally it will give some kind of error message, so then you have to re-do it. It's somewhat challenging to read the results if you leave it on your wrist. Overall, this sure beats going to the grocery store or doctors office to have one's blood pressure taken. I'm hoping it's pretty accurate, as no sure fire way to confirm this from what I know. For an easy way to monitor your BP at home, this little device is great ! It's compact & easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Palermo-Meier

customer_reviews.title: Verified Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate at all. I’m pregnant with a history of preeclampsia. Was told to monitor my bp at home and so I bought this. Started using over the weekend and my reading was through the roof and it scared me. Nothing but 230 and it would change readings on each arm. One side would be 230, the other arm would be 180. Had the inaccuracy verified at drs office. Thought I was in real trouble and it ends up the device is inaccurate. Long story short don’t buy this. Just go to cvs or Walgreens and use there free blood pressure sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Carson

customer_reviews.title: Not a accurate reading
customer_reviews.text: I checked my blood pressure as soon as I woke up and it was high. I took my bp pills laid down for around a hour and a half and then rechecked it. My blood pressure was 191/112; which is a crisis. I immediately headed to the doctor. When I got there my blood pressure was 125/86. I was shocked. My blood pressure usually do not read as high as the monitor said. So the fnp told me the cup is off. Soon as I left doctor I rechecked it and it was still reading high. So this cup isn’t accurate and I spent my co pay trying to make sure it was.
customer_reviews.author: Daphane Weston

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use, small enough to carry around.
customer_reviews.text: This blood pressure monitor is so simple and easy to use! It is made with good quality components and it seems like it will last for a long time. It keeps track of the last 10 measurements so you can keep track throughout the day easily. If you set the time on it it will also help keep track on the measurements at a certain time of day. It is also small enough to fit in a small bag to take away with you.
customer_reviews.author: Mellanie

customer_reviews.title: not accurate or consistent
customer_reviews.text: Over several days, my wife and I performed blood pressure tests for ourselves. Each time we did three readings. Each time we got different readings. Not even close. It was at one point where my wife thought I should take her to the hospital. I took her BP for the next 10 minutes and each time it was way up and way down. I do not recommend this to anyone that wants an accurate reading.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate readings confirmed. NO CASE could have caused a shipping problem or even heat damage.
customer_reviews.text: Product functioned fine but read inaccurate. The reading was 20 mmHg. Off +or- every time on multiple patients. Read and re read the directions as that many cuffs operate different and confirmed with a manual reading. Probably just an odd unit bumped or the heat got to it during shipping since it HAS NO CASE INCLUDED anything is possible.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use,  accurate reading.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor comes with instructions and 2 aaa batteries. I read the instructions to set up the date and time. It also provided tips on how to sit for it, and the most optimal time to take it. It also has a list of error codes. When I followed the instructions it produced an accurate reading, close to the reading I got at the doctors office earlier this month. It’s easy to wear on wrist too. I also own an arm cuff monitor and this was easier to figure out where to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gadget Like a Part of Your Body
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the easiest and within, or very close to a professionally taken reading. The package arrived 2 days before my mom’s doctor’s appointment, upon her arrival from the doctor’s I promptly used this device on her and what a revelation: systolic and diastolic were on point and happy to say that we have just discovered an essential and convenient part of our “awareness routine”. This is a must-have for everyone who needs to monitor their “beepees”.
customer_reviews.author: Claudine

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My husband was told by his doctor that he had really high blood pressure at his last visit and wants him to go back for another appointment. Because of this I wanted to monitor his blood pressure since he was sick and in a lot of pain when he seen the doctor and his blood pressure was taken. This item arrived quickly and even had batteries included in the box. I was able to start monitoring my husbands blood pressure right after I opened it up. This monitor also stores a history of your blood pressure. I absolutely love it and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amber m holthaus

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to track an electrical imbalance that interferes with my blood pressure and heart rate. This machine is at least 10points off; brought it with me to 3 different doctors and it was never accurate.
customer_reviews.author: mamakinz

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for someone who needs to track their blood pressure regularly. Item is easy to use and fits small wrists as well as larger wrists. Makes it easy to check your blood pressure without having to go to a doctor or use a self check at a pharmacy or department store. Has a memory function that will store up to 60 readings. I would definitely recommend this product, especially for those needing to track their blood pressure. I am positive we will continue to use it to monitor my husband's blood pressure regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Lambchop

customer_reviews.title: I great blood pressure cuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cuff as I am an EMT the is in school to be a paramedic and was up grading my medical bag. I wanted to replace my current electric blood pressure cuff with something that preformed better. I was a bit unsure when I bought this. After a week of using this with patients I am no longer unsure of this product. It is very clear to read and about as accurate as an electric blood pressure cuff can get. Quick and simple to use. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: computerjosh22

customer_reviews.title: Nice design 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Works really well so far. Bought for our mother to check her stats daily. The wrist design is much better than the bicep. Our mom likes it, as she has to check her BP & HR twice a day before taking her meds. We have even tried it out, works great, large display. I do wish it had a back light on display. We do recommend 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: 💜ALiSiN💜

customer_reviews.title: Great at-home blood pressure readings!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little blood pressure measurement device. It is extremely easy to use, I just popped batteries in and figured out how to use it to get my first reading without even looking at the directions. It does have a lot of information included though, but for the slightly more complex features, a quick overview of the instructions clarified everything! If you are worried about your blood pressure and want a device that you can use at home to get an idea of how you are doing, I highly recommend this device!
customer_reviews.author: BadWolfDad86

customer_reviews.title: 40 points different from Doc office
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my blood pressure using this product! I had exceptionally low blood pressure. I was concerned about my BP and for that reason I bought this. My excellent BP readings over time made me suspicious and the next time I went to the doc I took it with me to my appt. and compared the numbers. There was a 40 point difference! This is a dangerous product and gives a false sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: So Far so good!!!! Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read the instructions. Open batteries up and and install. Put it on my wrist and pushed start. Nice product. it’s compact enough to take with you in your purse or easy to travel with. It’s display is easy to see and read. So far the product has worked great for me. I check my BP in the morning and at night. I did install new fresh batteries, as I thought the ones that came with it seemed a little sluggish and I wanted to make sure I got a good reading.
customer_reviews.author: Chasermom12

customer_reviews.title: Battery issues
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know that this came with batteries at first so I tried to put in my own batteries (new and unused). This told me “low battery” even with brand new batteries. Then I found the batteries that came with it, put those in and it worked fine. But now I’m not sure what will happen when the other ones run out of juice. I wouldn’t risk buying this, though the readings seem like they are fairly accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Pengwen500

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable measurement
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I tested it against an actual real blood pressure (like the one you would find at a CVS) at work. The measurements were all off. The actual machine measured 125 plus or minus 5. The wrist band showed 139, 149 and then 108. Quite ridiculous. And apparently I got the version that doesn't connect to your phone. Its the BT version that connect to the phone, I got the WM. Ummm...how did I know which one was which.
customer_reviews.author: Pash

customer_reviews.title: What’s up with batteries dying so quickly?
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer, I had the same problem with the batteries dying and reading “lo” just after a couple of uses. The unit worked great for two months and then it seems like the batteries overheated right away or something like that. I am going to order again hoping there were just some bad units. Otherwise, it was quick and easy to use. I work as an RN on a memory care unit and it is difficult to take blood pressures manually on this population.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Systolic (upper) reading off by about 15-20
customer_reviews.text: The upper number is off by about 15-20 from my other monitors, and diastolic (bottom number) off by about 10. That's not bad for traveling. The display is not backlit, so it's difficult to read in low light. Just remember, the display faces you and is on the inner part of your wrist - otherwise I got wildly high readings. Good for travel. I probably won't use this as my main monitor.
customer_reviews.author: 人

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is small and easy to carry, which is perfect for people who need to travel and/or measure their blood pressure several times a day. It is easy to use and feels sturdy. I recommend it for anyone who needs to have their blood pressure measured in a snap (after having about 10 mins or so of resting time, of course) because it’s easy to carry and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cee H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of the accuracy of this blood pressure cuff but wanted something to easier to use than our existing one. Once I received the cuff I started testing it. I would take our blood pressure on this wrist cuff and than on my husbands upper arm cuff. Woohoo! The results were the same on each trial. That helped me determine the accuracy because we had taken the upper arm cuff to the doctors office and compared the results with the readings the nurse would receive. I really like this you. It came with the batteries so it was ready to use right
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Cuff fits large arms, works fast, accurate, consistent readings.
customer_reviews.text: First blood pressure cuff that fits my arm! The ones that are used on the top of the arm are always too small to fit my large upper arms. This one fits great and gives an accurate reading every time. Display is large and easy to read. Monitor is easy to operate with one touch of a button and works very quickly. I only wish it has multiple user capability to save both my husband and my reading separately.
customer_reviews.author: LLR0708

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. Not even close on readings. I'm an RN. I'd take a friend's b/p with a cuff and stethoscope then the wrist monitor. In many attempts, with different people, not even close...ever
customer_reviews.author: Pudden1949

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This little monitor is freaking awesome! When it first arrived I found it was smaller than I thought it would be, but I actually ended up really liking that because I don't have to store some huge massive thing and it's super effective. The wrist band could definitely be a little more comfortable but it honestly isn't bad at all and I don't really mind it because it's not like you're wearing the monitor at all times, you know? Over all, I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S

customer_reviews.title: BEST Wrist BP Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this monitor works. Its goes on my wrist, when it inflates I am not in pain nor does it irritate my sensitive skin. Also the read out is very large considering the size of the monitor which is great. I also really like that it has a memory of the prior 60 readings. (Of course if more than one person is using it, the memory isn't important.) I am going to order another monitor for my husband to use, so the memorized readings will apply to each of us. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R. Hallford

customer_reviews.title: All around decent
customer_reviews.text: This is an all around a good product, at least as someone who doesn't know if it's truly accurate or not (other's responses seem to be hit-or-miss, so I highly recommend comparing its results with more expensive machinery- I have yet to do this). The wrist cuff is a bit tight on me, and I have dainty wrists, so while I'm fine, it might be uncomfortable for someone with thicker wrists than I have. Batteries also come with the product, which is a relief because I did not have any in my house that were the required size.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: If by 20 points! Customer service please
customer_reviews.text: The cuff is off by 20 points both systolic and diastolic! It took me a little while to bring to the dr to check it out. Its past the return time frame. $25 for something I can't even use. I hope customer service reads this and replaces the cuff. 20 points is life and death difference.
customer_reviews.author: rnbland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and read, Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I recently started taking medication that required a frequent blood pressure check. Since Covid-19 hit, most of my doctors appointments have been online. I had to purchase a blood pressure monitor to be able to give that information to my doctors when I am in my appointments at home. This monitor was relatively inexpensive and had a nice, big easy to read screen. It also stores my measurements so that I have the ability to go back and look at past blood pressure statistics. This device is easy to set up and use. The only reason I gave it four stars as opposed to five is that the batteries were a little difficult to insert into the device.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for Home Use
customer_reviews.text: This product is great to check your blood pressure in the comfort of your home. The graph displayed in the instructions helps you understand if you have a healthy reading or not. It has proved very useful with my grandfather and his high blood pressure medication. It does not hurt like some of the arm ones do. The only thing about the product that was inconvenient, was the difficulty tighting it as much as I needed when the person has a small wrist. Outside of that, the screen was easy to read, the instructions helped me understand what I was reading, and it is more comfortable than other blood pressure devices we have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Ratha

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy! I was anxious to receive this as the ease of use was so appealing. While it is very easy to use, I'm not able to use it because it is so inaccurate! The pulse reading was accurate. The systolic number reads a little lower that it should be. The diastolic number was ridiculous. It reads way lower than it should. According to this monitor, my diastolic number is 50!! I don't think so! I tried several different times and get the same result. My husband also tried it and his diastolic number also read way too low. So disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Anderson

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is my second iproven wrist cuff monitor. I chose it because of it's consistent accuracy. I'm a nurse and have used many wrist cuffs over the years. Price doesn't always reflect how the product works. iproven is a good bang for the buck. The only complaint I would have to offer is that the velcro wore out way too soon on my first one; less than a year. I used it a lot but I think it should have fared a little better than it did. Otherwise, this cuff is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but inaccurate reading
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this product initially: good style, easy to read, easy to transport, and easy to use. However, it consistently registered my BP at 10-20 mmHG lower than what my BP actually was, resulting in me not taking my meds for almost two weeks. Luckily my BP isn’t dangerously elevated and I don’t need medication daily but this isn’t the case with everyone. Item was unfortunately returned.
customer_reviews.author: G37hotshot

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I used to have 70/120 but recently had nose bleeding and the doctor told me it was 100/150. That's the first time I found I had hypertension. I bought this one immediately at a reasonable price, it came the next day, and it was very accurate and convenient to use!! I love this product! I am more cautious now, such as not eating salty food and not drinking wine, or overworking, and my blood pressure is down to 88/140 in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This blood pressure cuff was very easy to use. I tested it against a professional blood pressure cuff and it is very accurate. The instructions are clear and easy to follow. The only drawback is it's uncomfortable when inflating to take my blood pressure. Maybe I'll try a few different ways of putting their cuff on so I can relieve some of the discomfort! All in all I am impressed with the Cuff!
customer_reviews.author: David Mayer

customer_reviews.title: nice item  iproven  blood pressure monitor.
customer_reviews.text: First one I tried,easy to use my friend help me set it.. Good price and free shipping ..I thought I wouldn't have to get one but I happy I got IProven blood pressure monitor. Thanks Dorothy
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions. Every time I tried to use this device I got wildly different readings. Only once did it read my BP correctly. I does read your pulse accurately. I have also seen automatic BP devices in my dentist office give bad readings. Mostly extremely high. I can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Super fast
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Fast and accurate. This is a pretty decent little blood pressure machine! I always register higher on machines than when someone manually takes it and this is no exception. But the machine is right on with my doctor office machines. Much more accurate than my other home machine. It’s also super fast! I’m very impressed for a home machine.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysReading

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My new Proven blood pressure monitor is accurate and easy to use. It attaches easily to my wrist without having to remove jacket or heavy sweater. With my old arm cuff it was difficult, especially in the winter, to quickly check my BP while relaxing or watching TV. My Proven inflates quickly while measuring at the same time and the numbers are large and easy to read. I also appreciate the memory feature with the date so I can easily track my BP for up to 60 days. I am so happy to have found this efficient BP monitor.
customer_reviews.author: James Davis

customer_reviews.title: Junk is not good when it comes to your health
customer_reviews.text: Readings are much lower than Omron 10 and my other BP monitors. Scared me. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: MarcoZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Affordable, and Accurate - Don't Have to be a Medical Professional to Use!
customer_reviews.text: The wrist blood pressure monitor watch was so easy to set up, I was able to use it right away, and it's accurate. I use it to measure my blood pressure and heart rate regularly, and I can do it by myself, which you can't do with upper arm blood pressure cuffs. I've found the readings to be very accurate, as I've compared to readings taken at the doctor's office. The screen If you need to monitor your blood pressure or heart rate regularly, you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey J.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Never can tell how accurate the readings are when they don't record and flash up some crazy notifications on why you didn't get a reading, Am a retired nurse so using all types of devices is nothing new for me, Quality is really lacking in this unit
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q Tx.

customer_reviews.title: Much Higher Readings
customer_reviews.text: The readings are consistently higher than what I had at the doctors office and other devices. All I can rely on is if the readings go dramatically different. Would not purchase as my first if your doctor needs something true.
customer_reviews.author: AllieBB

customer_reviews.title: Small, Compact and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a small and compact blood pressure cuff. It is very easy to use and seems to be quite accurate when I compare it another much larger blood pressure cuff and to my doctor's office. The instructions are easy to follow and it does not have any issues. However, it does require you to sit still and silent for several minutes before checking your blood pressure. Otherwise it is great. I would definitely recommend it to someone wanting to be able to check their blood pressure anywhere they go.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn O.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for me! I really liked how small the product is so it makes it convenient to carry around with me if needed. I also liked how it was essentially painless since it was measuring from the wrist. I have bigger arms so sometimes the arm ones feel like they're pinching my skin and it hurts. It measured in a normal amount of time and didn't take a long amount of time like some other blood pressure cuffs I've gotten in the past. Overall no complaints here! Really enjoyed the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight you can carry it with you anywhere.... easy to use, and accurate.. great for all sizes of people. I have big wrists and it's very comfortable, I also like that it shows you exactly how to hold your arm for the most accurate reading... even includes the batteries although I suggest getting stronger longer life aaa batteries. Wish it came with a carry case like a few other brands.
customer_reviews.author: teresa robins

customer_reviews.title: Throw out the old arm cuff and get IProven BP monitor instead
customer_reviews.text: This device is small and compact, so it is easy to take on the go. It is very simple to wrap on your wrist like a slap bracelet. No more struggling to get an arm cuff on in the right position with one hand. Set up is simple and explained well, and you will be up and running in just a few minutes to monitor yourself. Inflation is quiet, and done fast. Stop hesitating, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: LuLumom

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Super easy!
customer_reviews.text: This blood pressure monitor is very easy to use. It has a memory so that you can check on past results. It is very fast to get results, unlike the arm cuff style that I used in the past. It does not get so tight that it is uncomfortable. When I received it I tested it several times and it is very accurate. I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Dina M in Montana

product_meta.title: iProvèn Wrist Blood Pressure Monitor Watch - Digital Home Blood Pressure Meter - Manual Blood Pressure Cuff - Clinically Accurate & Fast Reading - BPM-337 by iProvèn, Grey
feature_bullets: MEASURE WHEREVER YOU GO - A more compact device doesn’t exist. Our Blood Pressure Wrist Monitor easily fits in your bag, making it perfect to take with you wherever you go.
THE RIGHT FIT FOR YOU - Our Automated Wrist Cuff model is designed to give you the most comfortable user-experience.

FINALLY UNDERSTAND YOUR BLOOD PRESSURE - The color indicators of the American Heart Association allow you to easily check and interpret your numbers. That’s what makes our BPM-337 the perfect Digital Home BP Monitoring Kit for you!
STORE YOUR READINGS - With the built-in memory function our BP Machine allows you to recall the last 60 readings.
ORDER TODAY - You’re protected by a 100 day, no-questions-asked money back guarantee and world class customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
